message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $12,000. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $8,000 to you. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $9,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and I offer you the product for $10,500?  Let's find a price that works for both of us.
I'm not sure $10,500 is the best deal for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  I'm willing to go down to $10,000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's make this happen.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than $10,000. I'm willing to go up to $9,500, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. Can you consider that?
